name: juxta.LINE
description:
This is an entry for Ludum Dare 46.
A 48-hour game jam which only one person is required to make a game from scratch. 

[ Entry on Ludum Dare ]

WE are a research initiative. YOU are a program that keeps failing bots alive, Cursor. Your task is to keep these bots alive. The reason is not important to you.

CONTROLS:

  • Movement
    • WASD: Move around
    • Space: Dash (if moving)
  • Interaction
    • Left / Right Mouse Button: Clear bug tile
  • System
    • Esc Key: Returns to main menu, there is no pause function (Out of time to implement)
    • R Key: Restart game

QUESTIONS: 
If you have any questions, feel free to ask from my twitter: @fiaKaiera
